content:
1. Keeping the status of the game after the program exits.
2. Able to enlarge the board when making a move.
3. Fixing some small bugs.
content_en:
1. Keeping the status of the game after the program exits.
2. Able to enlarge the board when making a move.
3. Fixing some small bugs.
content_zh:
1. 程序退出时可以保留盘面状态。
2. 落子时可以放大棋盘。
3. 修复了一些小的bug。
